data.comment: The match is underway at Orange Velodrome.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
In the minute 2, Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Frank Schneider signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Marseille's half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Yacine Adli (Bordeaux) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 5, Florian Thauvin is on target to give Marseille a 1-0 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Hiroki Sakai.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Hiroki Sakai (Marseille) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Bordeaux!
In the minute 11, Bordeaux drive upfield and Nicolas De Preville gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Marseille defender.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 12, Marseille have been given a penalty at Orange Velodrome...
Florian Thauvin (Marseille) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Corner awarded to Marseille.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Frank Schneider blows against Bordeaux's Hatem Ben Arfa for offside.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Marseille close to the penalty box.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Marseille's Jordan Amavi attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Bordeaux at Orange Velodrome.
Free kick Bordeaux.
Bordeaux are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 21, Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
In Marseille Bordeaux drive forward through Toma Basic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 25, Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 30, Florian Thauvin for Marseille drives towards goal at Orange Velodrome. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Marseille.
Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Yacine Adli is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 36, Bordeauxâ€™s Yacine Adli is on his feet again at Orange Velodrome.
Frank Schneider signals a Marseille throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Marseille.
In the minute 37, Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
In the minute 43, Marseille to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
At Orange Velodrome the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Bordeaux have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Marseille are whistled for offside.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Frank Schneider signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Marseille's half.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 49, Marseille's Morgan Sanson has been booked in Marseille.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 52, Frank Schneider waits before resuming play because Dario Benedetto for Marseille is still down.
Free kick Marseille.
Dario Benedetto has recovered and rejoins the match in Marseille.
In the minute 54, Goal! Marseille increase their lead to 2-0 through a well-placed header from Jordan Amavi.
Great play from Florian Thauvin to set up the goal.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
In the minute 56, Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Marseille.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Marseille to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Marseille.
Frank Schneider awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Paul Baysse.
Own goal in Marseille! Pablo Castro scores in his own net to make it 3-0.
In the minute 66, Paul Baysse is back on his feet again.
Frank Schneider signals a Marseille throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
In the minute 66, Jean-Louis Gasset (Bordeaux) is making a first substitution, with Hwang Ui-Jo replacing Yacine Adli.
Josh Maja is replacing Hatem Ben Arfa for Bordeaux at Orange Velodrome.
The away team have replaced Loris Benito with Maxime Poundje. This is the third substitution made today by Jean-Louis Gasset.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 69, Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Marseille.
Remi Oudin (Bordeaux) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mehdi Zerkane is replacing Remi Oudin for the away team.
Jimmy Briand is on a sub for Nicolas De Preville for Bordeaux.
In the minute 72, In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Duje Caleta Car is booked for the home team.
Bordeaux drives forward and Toma Basic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 73, Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marseille make their first substitution with Pape Alassane Gueye replacing Mickael Cuisance.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
The home team replace Florian Thauvin with Marley Ake.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Bordeaux reduce the deficit to 3-1 through Josh Maja.
Jimmy Briand instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 85, Play has been interrupted briefly in Marseille to check on Duje Caleta Car, who is grimacing with pain.
The home team replace Dario Benedetto with Luis Henrique.
Marseille make their fourth substitution with Kevin Strootman replacing Valentin Rongier.
In the minute 87, The home team has substituted Duje Caleta Car with Valere Germain. Andre Villas-Boas is thus making his fifth change.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
Bordeaux needs to be cautious. Marseille have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 89, Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Frank Schneider will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Marseille are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Frank Schneider signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Marseille's half.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bordeaux's Hwang Ui-Jo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Frank Schneider awards Marseille a goal kick.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Josh Maja of Bordeaux smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Full-time! The final score is 3-1.
